com.cloudpos.printer

Interface PrinterDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device, TimeConstants

    public interface PrinterDevice
extends Device, TimeConstants
    The PrinterDevice interface defines the printer APIs to be used by the applications.

    The Printer device object is obtained from the POSTerminal, its' as follows: 

     PrinterDevice printerDevice =
         (PrinterDevice) POSTerminal.getInstance().getDevice("cloudpos.device.printer");
    Among them, the "cloudpos.device.printer" string is to identify the printer device, defined by the specific implementation.

    Uses the printer device object to control the operation of the printer device.

    An app can request permission to access the device, as shown below: 

     <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_PRINTER"/>
    See Also:
    Device

      • sendESCCommand

        int sendESCCommand(byte[] esc)
                   throws DeviceException
        Send ESC, to operate the printer.

        The detail command format provided by the manufacturer.

        Parameters:
        esc - ESC command data
        Returns:
        the result >=0 success.
        Throws:

      • queryStatus

        int queryStatus()
                throws DeviceException
        Query the paper status in printer.
        Returns:
        -101 out of paper, 1 normal, -102 abnormal .

        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.
